Reviews.Title: No audio out
Reviews.Author: CrocodiliusPontifex
Reviews.Content: As far as viewing goes, this is a fine TV.  The sound is just ok, and for some reason there is no audio output on this TV to run it into an entertainment center.  How does that even happen?  I had to run a separate line out from my xbox360 to it, which fortunately is the primary way I use the TV.
